CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Finance Department?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Finance Department is arc {Admin and Facilities}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Human Resources Department?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Human Resources Department is arc {Admin and Facilities}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Finance Department} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Admin and Facilities} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Legal Department to Human Resources Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from IT Department to Human Resources Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Admin and Facilities to IT Department in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Finance Department and Admin and Facilities in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Finance Department and Admin and Facilities is {1726}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Legal Department and Finance Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Legal Department and Finance Department is {266}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from IT Department?
SC.A: The total flow output from IT Department is {557}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Human Resources Department?
SC.A: The total flow input by Human Resources Department is {601}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 489? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1726} from {Finance Department} to {Admin and Facilities}, a flow of {815} from {Admin and Facilities} to {Finance Department}, a flow of {583} from {Human Resources Department} to {IT Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 195? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {185} from {Admin and Facilities} to {IT Department}, a flow of {161} from {IT Department} to {Admin and Facilities}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 255 and 304? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {266} from {Legal Department} to {Finance Department}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Human Resources Department to IT Department or from Finance Department to Legal Department?
NC.A: The flow from {Human Resources Department} to {IT Department} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Admin and Facilities to IT Department, from IT Department to Admin and Facilities, or from IT Department to Human Resources Department?
NC.A: The flow from {IT Department} to {Human Resources Department} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Finance Department}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Admin and Facilities} and {Finance Department}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc IT Department, Arc Human Resources Department, Arc Legal Department, Arc Finance Department, Arc Admin and Facilities}.
